page.title: 03THE VALLEY ESTATE, CORSHAM
page.content:
This large estate has been built over the last 10 years to the west of old Corsham . We did a door to door survey of the estate -in all we interviewed 69 people . We learned about where people lived before they came to Corsham and where they work. Here is a chart showing where people work. Corsham = 8 Bath = 8 Hawthorn = 2 Retired = 7 MOD = 6 Gastard = 1 Bristol = 3 Trowbridge = 1 Chipping Sodbury = 2 Unemployed = 1 Chippenham = 5
Therefore Corsham is a dormitory town for the towns nearby. From the survey 25 people have moved here in the last five years, only 4 people have lived in Corsham for over 15 years. The average family size is four.
